node.title: 'You feel pretty helpless': What it's like to play Ash Barty at the Australian Open
node.alt: An Australian female tennis player walks along a court with a towel over her shoulder.
node.description: Ash Barty's opponents have had no luck finding ways to beat the women's world number one at Melbourne Park, as she bids to win her home major for the first time.
node.content:
["When words such as \"tough\", frustrating\" and \"tricky\" are used to describe Ash Barty as an opponent, it is easy to see why the Australian sits atop the world rankings.\u00a0", "Barty already has two majors in her keeping\u00a0\u2014 the 2019 French Open championship and last year's Wimbledon title \u2014 and she remains favourite to add another to her tally at Melbourne Park.", "Her Australian Open campaign\u00a0has so far been impressive.\u00a0The 25-year-old is yet to drop a set and her serve has only been broken once.", "And perhaps posing\u00a0as an ominous warning for her US rival Madison Keys in tonight's semifinal on Rod Laver Arena, Barty's coach Craig Tyzzer feels his charge can still improve on her performances at the tournament.", "Keys\u00a0\u2014 a former world number seven and US Open finalist\u00a0\u2014 will not be a pushover, as Barty and her \"team\" have acknowledged.", "She has been in superb form in Melbourne,\u00a0as illustrated by her convincing victories over seeds\u00a0Barbora Krej\u010d\u00edkov\u00e1 and Paula Badosa\u00a0in her two most recent matches.", "But while Keys is immensely talented, she\u00a0will have to come up with a strategy to outwit Barty, whose game appears to have so few weaknesses.", "\"You feel pretty helpless,\" said Jessica Pegula, after she\u00a0lost to Barty in the quarterfinals.", "\"I think that when she gets into a rhythm \u2026\u00a0her game just kind of picks you apart a little bit, and it can be really frustrating because you don't feel like you can get a lot of free points, there's really not much you can do.", "\"It doesn't feel good. It feels kind of helpless. I didn't feel there was a lot I could do and then even games where I was up really easy, I still didn't win the games.", "\"She just doesn't give you any free points.\"", "", "
Barty has not dropped a set\u00a0this tournament.(Getty Images: Cameron Spencer)
", "Pegula could only win two games off Barty in Tuesday's quarterfinal, going down 6-2, 6-0 in just over an hour.", "The American is no easybeat. She was seeded 21 in Melbourne and was an Australian Open\u00a0quarterfinalist last year.", "\"I think she just does everything really well. Honestly, she just does everything, I think, a little bit better than everybody,\" she said.", "
Barty's 'variety' among her strengths
", "Pegula's countrywoman Danielle Collins\u00a0\u2014 who plays\u00a0Polish seventh seed\u00a0Iga \u015awi\u0105tek in the other semifinal\u00a0\u2014 has triumphed in\u00a0only one of her four matches against Barty.", "Collins said Barty was not a one-dimensional player, which meant she could\u00a0find several ways to win.", "\"I really admire Ash as a player,\" said Collins, who is the 27th seed at Melbourne Park.\u00a0", "Barty has won two of her three previous meetings with Keys, the most recent being in\u00a0the 2019 French Open quarterfinals before she lifted the trophy at Roland Garros.", "", "
Madison Keys's forehand is one of her weapons.(Getty Images: Cameron Spencer)
", "Pegula said Keys had the game to play Barty \"pretty close\" tonight, noting the power of her serve and forehand.", "But she highlighted\u00a0Barty could not be\u00a0allowed to dictate terms, as that was when her opponents fall into her trap.", "\"Just to do it two out of three sets, for somebody to beat her (Barty) is tough because she just makes you play so much and does everything so well,\" Pegula\u00a0said.", "\"I think she's definitely living in everyone's head a little bit. I don't think anyone is going to feel great going out to play her because they know they have to play really well.\""]
